extension.summary: Scans your source folders for movies files that are missing from your library.
extension.description: Scans your source folders for movie files that are missing from your library. The scanner looks for files with the following extensions: mpg, mpeg, avi, flv, wmv, mkv, 264, 3g2, 3gp, ifo, mp4, mov, iso, ogm Custom extensions can be added via the settings.
